full_summary:
### RFP for Contaminated Sites and Biological Resource Consulting Services

#### Details
| **Title** | **English** | **French** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **RFP Reference** | MX-42835262203 | MX-42835262203 |
| **Solicitation Number** | ES23SLAO-80507 | ES23SLAO-80507 |
| **Publication Date** | August 11, 2023 | August 11, 2023 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | September 20, 2023, at 14:00 (AST) | September 20, 2023, at 14:00 (AST) |

#### Period of Performance
The Source List will be for a period of three (3) years from the contract award date. The total estimated maximum value of the contract is $9,000,000.00 CAD.

#### Solicitation Overview
Defence Construction Canada invites consulting firms interested in providing contaminated sites and biological resource consulting services to submit an abbreviated proposal for establishing a Source List to provide "as and when required" professional services specific to Department of National Defence (DND) requirements in Ontario and Atlantic Canada.

#### Selection Criteria
Proposals will be evaluated based on the established criteria outlined in the RFAP document.

#### Bidding Documents and Instructions
Bidding and documents are available on the MERX electronic bidding system. Fees may apply. See https://www.merx.com/public/pricing for more information.

If you experience any issues while accessing the bidding documents, please contact:

Mark Smith
Email: [mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca)
Phone: 613-949-6911

You can submit a proposal and access the bidding documents on http://www.merx.com.

Note: The contact information and bidding document link may be updated. Be sure to verify this information to ensure accuracy.

**Trade Agreements**
This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

**Payment Terms**
Payment will be made in accordance with the terms outlined in the contract.

We look forward to receiving your proposal! If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to us.

**La Couronne du Sultanat d'Oman**
